page.title: 12DARTMOUTH PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school has 250 children and 4 areas.There is a big hall and dining area and 10 home-bases.Our school has 2 computers and 1 printer. We have a kiln for our clay. Bubble and Squeak are our guinea pigs.The children play with them at play time.The school has a music room,a video and 2 tvs.Our caretaker looks after our school.He paints the walls and mends the cupboards.We have cookery and wood- work areas which we use a lot in club time.The library is near to the hall. Some classes have quiet rooms next door,they share 4 practical areas for painting,clay,science etc. We have designed a strong,exciting adventure playground which we opened this July. Our outdoor learners' pool is heated and most of us can swim.We get a lot of fun from it.We have 3 big,windy playgrounds and a football pitch.
